basic.skillHits: With {{currentSkill}} {{skillType}} and {{percentToNext}} percent to next level you will need {{rawSkill}} hits to reach {{desiredSkill}} skill.
basic.timeForSkill: To reach that skill it will take approximately {{timeForSkill}}.
basic.percentage: You currently have {{percentage}}% of required hits.
basic.offlineTraining: To reach this skill just through offline training it will take {{offlineTraining}}.

magic.requiredMana: With magic level {{currentSkill}} and {{percentToNext}} percent to next level you will need to use {{rawSkill}} mana to reach magic level {{desiredSkill}}.
magic.regenerationTime: To reach that magic level by regeneration it will take approximately {{timeForSkill}}.
magic.potionsAmount: To reach that magic level by potions it will require {{manaPotions}} mana potions.
magic.percentage: You currently burned {{percentage}}% of total required mana.

experience.missingExperience: With level {{currentLevel}} and {{percentToNext}} percent to next level you need {{missingExperience}} experience to reach level {{desiredLevel}}.
experience.percentage: You currently have {{percentage}}% of required experience.

capacity.scavengeAndCarlin: With scavenge charm and active Venore world change
capacity.capacityResult: At level {{level}} {{bonusMessage}} you will have {{capacity}} capacity.

fishing.fishingResult: With {{currentSkill}} fishing and {{percentToNext}} percent to next fishing you need {{neededTries}} tries to reach {{desiredSkill}} fishing.
fishing.neededTime: To reach that fishing it will take approximately {{timeForSkill}}.
fishing.percentage: You currently have {{percentage}}% of required tries.

attackValue.attackValueResult: When using weapon that has {{weaponAttack}} attack and {{skill}} skill you get additional {{attackValue}} attack value.
attackValue.nextSkillups: With that weapon here are the next skillups that will give you bonus attack value:

speedBreakpoints.speedResult: As level {{level}} {{withBonus}} {{bonusText}} you will have {{speed}} speed.

stamina.staminaResult: If you have {{currentStamina}} stamina and you want to have {{goalStamina}} stamina, you need to wait {{requiredHours}} hours and {{requiredMinutes}} minutes.
stamina.staminaGoal: You will have desired stamina at {{goalTime}}.

deathPenalty.deathPenaltyResult: If you die on level {{currentLevel}} you will lose {{experienceLoss}} experience. It will be {{percentage}}% of your total experience.

progressMonitor.name: Name
progressMonitor.highscoresUpdate: Highscores are updated every 2 hours. Last update {{updateDate}} ago.
